cause.description:
We are holding a car wash in scott's name. All proceeds will go to his family and they can do what they please with the money.
When: Saturday July 14th, 2007 Where: Shell gas station off of Hall and Allen Time: 11-4
please come and show you support whether that be helping to wash cars or being a costumer, please spread the word
Thank You
1. For Scott's family
2. In memory of an amazing young man
cause.name: Scrubbin for Scott
